name: OrderItemProductParameterRel
comment: This entity contains the relationship between the products and it s respective parameters.For example Product: SIM then it s parameters can be Type of SIM (nano,micro) etc.
vf short description: This entity contains the relationship between the products and it s respective parameters.For example Product: SIM then it s parameters can be Type of SIM (nano,micro) etc.

fields.name: OrderItemProductParameterRelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: OrderItemProductParameterRelKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for each order item product parameter relationship in aLDM. Generated Key based on Order Item Id, Order Item Product Id, Order Item Product Parameter Name, Effective Date

fields.name: ProductParameterSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderItemProductSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderItemProductId
fields.comment: Indicates the source id of the product. When OrderItem.product.id is not null then OrderItem.product.id // When ProductSpec is available in Product InventoryWhen OrderItem.product.referenceId is not null then OrderItem.product.referenceId // When ProductSpec is not in Product InventoryWhen OrderItem.product.id is null and OrderItem.product.referenceId is null then OrderItem.product.primaryProductId // UC: When Standalone Add-On is added//Implementation Note: Mandatory to be populated per above relation types.

fields.name: OrderItemProductParameterName
fields.comment: Indicates the name of the order item product s characteristic like  Payment_Options . characteristic.name

fields.name: OrderItemProductParameterValue
fields.comment: Indicates the value of the product characteristic . characteristic.value

fields.name: OrderItemId
fields.comment: Indicates the order Item source id. OrderItem.id

fields.name: EffectiveDate
fields.comment: Indicates the effective date of the order item s product and it s corresponding parameter relationship. When source is OrderItem.product.characteristic thenIf OrderItem.product.characteristic.value has new value for the same OrderItem.product.characteristic.name then use OrderItem.product.characteristic.metadata.value Where OrderItem.product.characteristic.metadata.metadataType = Operational and OrderItem.product.characteristic.metadata.name = changeDate as effective date for new effective record. //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation.When source is OrderItem.characteristic thenIf OrderItem.characteristic.value has new value for the same OrderItem.characteristic.name then use OrderItem.characteristic.metadata.value Where OrderItem.characteristic.metadata.metadataType = Operational and OrderItem.characteristic.metadata.name = changeDate as effective date for new effective record. //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation.

fields.name: EndDate
fields.comment: Indicates the end date of the order item s product and it s corresponding parameter relationship. When source is OrderItem.product.characteristic thenIf OrderItem.product.characteristic.value has new value for the same OrderItem..productcharacteristic.name then use OrderItem.product.characteristic.metadata.value Where OrderItem.product.characteristic.metadata.metadataType = Operational and OrderItem.product.characteristic.metadata.name = changeDate as end date for expiring the previous effective record. For current active record, the End Date is blank/future date. //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation.When source is OrderItem.characteristic thenIf OrderItem.characteristic.value has new value for the same OrderItem.characteristic.name then use OrderItem.characteristic.metadata.value Where OrderItem.characteristic.metadata.metadataType = Operational and OrderItem.characteristic.metadata.name = changeDate as end date for expiring the previous effective record. For current active record, the End Date is blank/future date. //Customization Instruction: Please validate during implementation.

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OrderItemSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ParameterTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates if the parameter is for the product offering or the product specification. When OrderItem.Product.characteristic is the source then "Product Specification" else "Product Offering".

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
